DefaultEvent.Description:
$Isery -> イザリー$"The Scholar will give you some notes in return. Bring them to me, and I shall be most pleased."

Isery slides the casket over to you, and very pointedly does not enumerate the consequences of returning without the notes. Instead: they smile, too wide, and you shiver.

ChildBranches.Name: Accept a new commission
ChildBranches.Description: $Admiralty -> 海軍省$You are hardly squeamish about smuggling red honey. If you change your mind, you could always turn the shipment over to the Admiralty instead.

DefaultEvent.Description: $Isery -> イザリー$"I thought, I really did, that you were made of sterner stuff," Isery tells you, sorrow on their sharp-edged features. "Still. I am not the sort to hold a grudge. Come back, if you change your mind."

ChildBranches.Name: Refuse their request
ChildBranches.Description: $lamplighter bee -> 灯点けミツバチ, Cage-Gardens -> 檻の庭園$You think of lamplighter bees and Cage-Gardens, and your mouth, of its own volition, shapes a refusal.

Description:
$Alarming Scholar -> 不安を催させる学者, Isery -> イザリー$Your Patron beckons you into their office above the Honeyed Tongue. "I have a delivery for the Alarming Scholar in London," they tell you, over a meal of fungus-blossom and sea-lily soup. "A delivery that needs to pass beneath the notice of the Revenue."

Isery places a casket on the table, and slides it open with a dull click. Inside are vials of what is unmistakably red honey. It gleams malevolently.
Name: $Isery -> イザリー$Visit Isery's Office
